account_onboarding.q: How do I apply for a new credit card?
account_onboarding.a: You can apply through the app or website by completing a short form and submitting KYC documents.

account_onboarding.q: Who is eligible for a credit card?
account_onboarding.a: Eligibility depends on age, income, and credit score. FinAI can check your eligibility quickly.

account_onboarding.q: What documents are required to apply?
account_onboarding.a: You typically need a valid ID, address proof, and PAN card. The app guides you step-by-step.

account_onboarding.q: Can I apply for multiple credit cards?
account_onboarding.a: Yes, but approvals depend on your credit limit and banking policies. FinAI can suggest suitable options.

account_onboarding.q: Can I update my personal details after account creation?
account_onboarding.a: Yes, details like email, phone number, and address can be updated after verification.

account_onboarding.q: What types of credit cards are available?
account_onboarding.a: We offer rewards, cashback, travel, and business credit cards. FinAI can suggest the best option for you.

account_onboarding.q: How long does account verification take?
account_onboarding.a: KYC verification is usually completed within 24–48 hours after submission.

account_onboarding.q: Can I check my credit limit?
account_onboarding.a: Yes, ask 'What is my credit limit?' and FinAI will provide your current limit instantly.

account_onboarding.q: How can I close my credit card account?
account_onboarding.a: You can request account closure through the app after settling outstanding dues.

account_onboarding.q: Can I link my card to multiple bank accounts?
account_onboarding.a: Yes, you can select a primary account for payments but multiple accounts can be added for convenience.
Absolutely. We follow strict banking security standards and encryption policies.

card_delivery.q: How long does card delivery take?
card_delivery.a: Cards are usually delivered within 3–7 business days once approved.

card_delivery.q: Can I track my card delivery?
card_delivery.a: Yes — you will receive an SMS and email with a tracking link once your card is dispatched.

card_delivery.q: Can I change my delivery address after applying?
card_delivery.a: Yes, if your card hasn't been dispatched yet. Verification is required to update the address.

card_delivery.q: My card was marked delivered but I didn’t receive it. What should I do?
card_delivery.a: FinAI can raise a courier investigation and request a replacement card if necessary.
Express delivery may be available depending on your location. FinAI can check eligibility.

card_delivery.q: How will I receive my card PIN?
card_delivery.a: Your PIN will be sent via SMS or you can set a custom PIN through the app.

card_delivery.q: What should I do if my card is damaged upon delivery?
card_delivery.a: You can report it immediately via FinAI to request a replacement card.

card_delivery.q: Can someone else receive my card on my behalf?
card_delivery.a: Yes, but proper identity verification is required for security reasons.

card_delivery.q: Will I get an email confirmation when my card is dispatched?
card_delivery.a: Yes, FinAI will send dispatch notifications with tracking details.

card_delivery.q: Can I temporarily hold my card delivery?
card_delivery.a: Yes, FinAI can help request a hold or reschedule the delivery date.

transactions_emi.q: How can I view my recent transactions?
transactions_emi.a: Just ask 'Show my recent transactions' and FinAI will list them after account verification.

transactions_emi.q: How do I convert a purchase into EMI?
transactions_emi.a: Ask 'Convert this transaction to EMI' and FinAI will display available plans.

transactions_emi.q: Are there charges for EMI conversion?
transactions_emi.a: Some banks may charge a processing fee or interest. FinAI will show all costs before confirming.

transactions_emi.q: What is the minimum transaction amount for EMI?
transactions_emi.a: Transactions above ₹1,500 are typically eligible. Exceptions may apply.

transactions_emi.q: Can I convert multiple transactions into EMI at once?
transactions_emi.a: Yes, if each transaction meets eligibility criteria. FinAI can process them together.

transactions_emi.q: How do I dispute a suspicious transaction?
transactions_emi.a: Select the transaction or provide details and FinAI will raise a dispute on your behalf.

transactions_emi.q: Can international transactions be converted to EMI?
transactions_emi.a: No, most international transactions, wallet loads, and cash withdrawals are not eligible.

transactions_emi.q: How can I categorize my transactions?
transactions_emi.a: FinAI can help tag and categorize transactions for easier tracking and budgeting.

transactions_emi.q: Can I get notifications for large transactions?
transactions_emi.a: Yes, FinAI can alert you via SMS or app notifications for transactions above a set limit.

transactions_emi.q: Is there a limit on EMI duration?
transactions_emi.a: EMI plans usually range from 3 to 24 months. FinAI will show available durations for each transaction.

bill_and_statement.a: Your statement is generated monthly based on your billing cycle date.
Yes — you can download up to 24 months of past statements from your app or request via FinAI.

bill_and_statement.q: Can I change my billing cycle?
bill_and_statement.a: Some banks allow changing billing cycles. FinAI can check eligibility and assist in the change.

bill_and_statement.q: Why is my bill higher this month?
bill_and_statement.a: Higher bills may include new transactions, interest, fees, or EMI charges. FinAI can provide a detailed breakdown.

bill_and_statement.q: How can I get my statement emailed?
bill_and_statement.a: FinAI can email your statement instantly once you request it.

bill_and_statement.q: Can I get a duplicate statement?
bill_and_statement.a: Yes, duplicate statements can be generated anytime for previous months.

bill_and_statement.q: How do I read my statement?
bill_and_statement.a: FinAI can guide you through each section of your statement including transactions, fees, and due amount.
Yes, all statements are encrypted and securely delivered through authenticated channels.

bill_and_statement.q: Can I subscribe to e-statements only?
bill_and_statement.a: Yes, FinAI can update your preference to receive only digital statements.

bill_and_statement.q: What is the minimum payment on my bill?
bill_and_statement.a: The minimum amount is usually 5% of the total outstanding or as defined by your bank.

repayments.a: You can pay via UPI, net banking, AutoPay, credit card apps, or NEFT.
A grace period of 2–3 days may apply depending on your bank and payment method.

repayments.q: Can I pay more than the minimum amount?
repayments.a: Yes, paying more reduces interest charges. FinAI can help you specify an amount.

repayments.q: Can I set up automatic payments?
repayments.a: Yes, AutoPay can be set for minimum or full payment each month after verification.

repayments.q: How do I check my outstanding balance?
repayments.a: Ask 'What is my outstanding balance?' and FinAI will provide the latest amount.

repayments.q: Can I schedule a payment for a future date?
repayments.a: Yes, FinAI can schedule a payment on any date you choose.

repayments.q: Are there penalties for late payment?
repayments.a: Late payments may incur fees and interest. FinAI can show exact charges for your account.

repayments.q: Can I change my repayment method?
repayments.a: Yes, you can switch between UPI, net banking, or AutoPay anytime.

repayments.q: How do I know if my payment was successful?
repayments.a: FinAI confirms each successful payment with a receipt and notification.
Yes, partial payments are allowed and will reflect in your outstanding balance.

collections_overdue.q: What happens if my payment is overdue?
collections_overdue.a: Late payments may incur fees and interest. FinAI can guide you on repayment options.

collections_overdue.q: Can I pay part of my overdue bill?
collections_overdue.a: Yes, FinAI can help you make a partial payment towards your overdue amount.

collections_overdue.q: Will late payments affect my credit score?
collections_overdue.a: Yes, overdue payments may impact your credit score. FinAI can suggest ways to minimize the effect.

collections_overdue.q: Can I request extra time to pay?
collections_overdue.a: Some banks allow extensions or repayment plans. FinAI can check your eligibility.

collections_overdue.q: How do I get reminders for overdue bills?
collections_overdue.a: FinAI can send notifications via SMS, email, or in-app alerts before and after due dates.

collections_overdue.q: Can I speak to a collections agent?
collections_overdue.a: Yes, FinAI can connect you to customer support for overdue account assistance.

collections_overdue.q: Are there options to restructure my overdue payments?
collections_overdue.a: Yes, FinAI can help explore repayment plans or settlements if eligible.

collections_overdue.q: Will my account be blocked if I miss a payment?
collections_overdue.a: Accounts may be temporarily restricted. FinAI can guide you on restoring access.

collections_overdue.q: Are partial payments counted towards reducing interest?
collections_overdue.a: Yes, any payment reduces the principal and accrued interest accordingly.

collections_overdue.q: Can I automate overdue repayment notifications?
collections_overdue.a: Yes, FinAI can schedule recurring reminders until payment is completed.
